mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_id, c.comment_id, c.content, r.rcontent, r.create_time, r.state, r.parent_id, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_img FROM tb_comment_reply r, tb_user u, tb_movie_comment c WHERE r.parent_id=#{userId} AND r.user_id=u.user_id AND r.comment_id=c.comment_id AND r.state=0

SELECT r.reply_id, c.comment_id, c.content, rcontent, r.create_time, r.state, r.parent_id, u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_img FROM tb_movie_comment c, tb_user u, tb_comment_reply r WHERE r.comment_id=c.comment_id AND r.user_id=u.user_id AND r.comment_id=#{commentId}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_comment_reply SET state =1 WHERE comment_id = #{movieComment.commentId} AND user_id = #{user.userId}
